propertiesMeta.name: permission
propertiesMeta.description: Name of the permission described by this rule.

propertiesMeta.name: inset
propertiesMeta.description: Inset shadows are drawn inside the border (even transparent ones), above the background, but below content.

propertiesMeta.name: blur
propertiesMeta.description: The larger this value, the bigger the blur, so the shadow becomes bigger and lighter.

propertiesMeta.name: blurUnit
propertiesMeta.description: The larger this value, the bigger the blur, so the shadow becomes bigger and lighter.

propertiesMeta.name: spread
propertiesMeta.description: Positive values will cause the shadow to expand and grow bigger, negative values will cause the shadow to shrink.

propertiesMeta.name: spreadUnit
propertiesMeta.description: Positive values will cause the shadow to expand and grow bigger, negative values will cause the shadow to shrink.

ControlAccessRight.description: An access right which is checked by controls. In the Schema a defaultValue of true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

name.description: Name of the access definition in the HTML.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.

visible.description: Determine if an access definition is shown to the user.

description.description: A long description of this access definition.

defaultValueInternal.description: Defines the default of this control access right. This will be used if the check for this access right does not return a result. true mean access is granted, false is denied, null is ask parent.

objectType.description: An enum defining the variable type.
An enum defining the variable type.
An enum defining the variable type.
An enum defining the variable type.

Locale.description: (Deprecated, use ProjectLocale from general) A list of locales for which we have a localization file in the project.

color.description: Defining a color as CSS color: #-hexadecimal, rgb(), rgba(), hsl(), hsla(), css color keyword, none or transparent.
Defining a color as CSS color: #-hexadecimal, rgb(), rgba(), hsl(), hsla(), lowercase css color keyword or transparent.

showThenActions.description: Holds the current state of the Trigger GUI. Not used in runtime
Holds the current state of the Trigger GUI. Not used in runtime
Holds the current state of the Trigger GUI. Not used in runtime

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

injectContextObject.description:
Inject context object.
Call ctx.success() or ctx.error(TcHmi.Errors.ERROR)

waitMode.description: Synchronous: Next step will called after last JavaScript line. Asynchronous: Next step will called after calling ctx.success() or ctx.error(TcHmi.Errors.ERROR)

success.description: Steps which will be called after call of ctx.success() with Asynchronous or last line with Synchronous.

error.description: Steps which will be called after call of ctx.success() with Asynchronous or an exception with Synchronous.

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

asyncWait.description: The next step is called after the completion of this step.

description.description: A long description of this control.

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

anyOf.title: Comment
anyOf.description: Free comment. Will be ignored on runtime.

active.description: Should action be active? Defaults to true.

collapsed.description: Should action be collapsed? Not used in runtime

preventDefault.description:
If activated the default action of the event will not be triggered.
If set on touch events the corresponding mouse events will not be triggered.

displayName.description: Name which should be presented the user.

virtualControlRight.description: Name of the virtual control right.
